newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures mixed in light, late trade.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures mixed in light, late trade.

text.p: May 2 - IMM currencies remained mixed in light, choppy trade. June and Sept sterling trimmed losses, with June trading at $1.62. June yen popped slightly higher, while Can dollars held onto gains. Expectations about a U.S. budget resolution kept marks and Swiss francs under pressure, traders said. (Chicago Derivatives Desk (312)408-8750))
